rows.label: qst702101_msg0001
rows.name: Ah, I'm glad to see you all!

rows.label: qst702101_msg0002
rows.name:
I am but a humble retainer of
Prince Adel's...

rows.label: qst702101_msg0003
rows.name:
And charged with providing medical
care to the great army that resides in
our beautiful province of Aletta.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0004
rows.name:
As you can imagine, I don't have
enough staff for the job... Nor, indeed,
do I have enough "stuff", either.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0005
rows.name:
In particular, I'm running dangerously
low on Panacellin.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0006
rows.name:
It's a substance which can be gathered
at the Tirkin Cliff Colony.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0007
rows.name:
I tried to just send strong-looking
militia soldiers to fetch it. Alas...

rows.label: qst702101_msg0008
rows.name:
Those Invidians are so reckless,
and there's no talking to them.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0009
rows.name:
You are aware of how their fighting
style involves self-inflicted cuts? Well,
because of that, in the end...

rows.label: qst702101_msg0010
rows.name:
I wound up using more Panacellin than
those fools could bring back! It was a
complete disaster, let me tell you...

rows.label: qst702101_msg0011
rows.name:
And so, to make a long story short...
I'd be most grateful if you could find
the time to help me out of this bind.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0101
rows.name:
Could you bring me a few bundles of
Panacellin, then, please?

rows.label: qst702101_msg0102
rows.name:
You can find them around where
the Tirkins live, the aptly named
Tirkin Cliff Colony.

rows.label: qst702101_msg0201
rows.name:
I say. Is that the Panacellin in your
pocket, or...?

rows.label: qst702101_msg0202
rows.name:
Oh, it is? Well, color me impressed.
You brought it all back, and not so
much as a scratch on any of you!

rows.label: qst702101_msg0204
rows.name:
I really wish those militia louts would
learn some things from you all.
It'd make my life easier at least...

rows.label: qst702101_msg0205
rows.name:
Ah, but perhaps I shouldn't be
comparing simple footsoldiers with
great heroes of your kind...

rows.label: qst702101_msg0206
rows.name:
In any case, I thank you for your help.
This should keep us going for a while.
